title: 2nd Grade Thinking Skills
description: Practice explaining your thinking with fun questions!

prompts.input: Emma has 8 apples. She gives 3 apples to her friend. How many apples does Emma have now? Explain how you figured it out.
Why do you think birds fly south in the winter? Use what you know about weather and animals.
hints: Think about what happens to the weather in winter
What do birds need to survive?
